dct_title_s: The Christian Herald map of Palestine
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the twelve tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Pictorial vignette: Panorama of the Holy Land from the top of Mount Piscah.
Includes chart: Chart of the seasons, productions, etc.
3 inset maps: Travels of the apostle Paul and the world as known to the Hebrews -- Plan of Jerusalem holy places -- Peninsula of Mt. Sinai.
